    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_103065</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Magnetic force through steel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Magnetische Kraft durch Stahl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Force magnétique par l'acier</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Força magnética através do aço</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Forza magnetica attraverso acciaio</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαγνητική δύναμη μέσω του χάλυβα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Fuerza magnética a través del acero</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Second of four diagrams showing an experimental setup used to test if magnetic forces can pass through steel. Shown here is the setup with the magnet.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">bench</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">magnetic force</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">needle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">steel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">support</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">thread</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">An zweiter Stelle von vier Diagrammen verwendete 
das Zeigen einer experimentellen Installation zu prüfen, wenn 
magnetische Kräfte durch Stahl überschreiten können. Hier 
gezeigt die Installation mit dem Magneten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">En second lieu de quatre diagrammes montrer une 
installation expérimentale testait si les forces magnétiques peuvent
passer par l'acier. Montrée ici est l'installation avec 
l'aimant.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Em segundo de quatro diagramas mostrar uma 
instalação experimental usou-se testar se as forças magnéticas 
pudessem passar através do aço. É mostrada aqui a 
instalação com o ímã.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In secondo luogo di quattro schemi mostrare una 
messa a punto sperimentale ha usato esaminare se le forze magnetiche 
possono passare attraverso acciaio. È indicata qui la messa a 
punto con il magnete.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δεύτερο τεσσάρων διαγραμμάτων που εμφανίζουν 
πειραματική οργάνωση που χρησιμοποιείται για να εξετάσει εάν οι 
μαγνητικές δυνάμεις μπορούν να περάσουν μέσω του χάλυβα. 
Εμφανισμένη εδώ είναι η οργάνωση με το μαγνήτη.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En segundo lugar de cuatro diagramas mostrar una 
disposición experimental probaba si las fuerzas magnéticas pueden 
pasar a través del acero. Se muestra aquí la disposición con 
el imán.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bank</string>
          </keyword>
